message: Let's start with a fair deal.  I'm offering you 10% of the money. This gives you a good start and leaves plenty for me. We can always renegotiate later.
I think 40% is a fair share for you. Remember, the money is losing value for you with each passing round.
I'm willing to split the money evenly now. It's clear we can't agree on a deal where one of us gets significantly more. Let's end this on a fair note.
Considering the money's decreasing value for you, I think 45% is a generous offer. It's better to accept now rather than lose more value in the next round.
